title: Conducting a feasibility study on the construction of the Civil Airport at Digana
decision_details: - The proposal made by Hon. Nimal Siripala de Silva, the Minister of Transport and Civil Aviation, to conduct a feasibility study on the construction of a domestic airport in Maberiyatenna of Digana in the Kandy District for the  operation of medium size aircrafts linking the Kandy City and the other ares of the Island, was approved by the Cabinet.
